mapper.select: SELECT A.RN, A.PROD_NO, A.PROD_NAME, A.PRICE, A.DISCOUNT, A.PROD_CONTENT, A.ORIGIN, A.STOCK, A.PROD_CATEGORY_NAME, A.PROD_CREATE_DATE, A.IS_THUMBNAIL FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY P.PROD_NO DESC) AS RN, P.PROD_NO, P.PROD_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT, P.PROD_CONTENT, P.ORIGIN, P.STOCK, P.PROD_CREATE_DATE, C.PROD_CATEGORY_NAME, TN.IS_THUMBNAIL FROM PROD_CATEGORY C INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PROD_CATEGORY_NO = C.PROD_CATEGORY_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD_THUMBNAIL TN ON P.PROD_NO = TN.PROD_NO) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT P.PROD_NO, P.PROD_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT, P.PROD_CONTENT, P.ORIGIN, P.STOCK, P.PROD_CATEGORY_NO, C.PROD_CATEGORY_NAME, P.PROD_CREATE_DATE d FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN PROD_CATEGORY C ON C.PROD_CATEGORY_NO = P.PROD_CATEGORY_NO WHERE P.PROD_NO = #{prodNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROD_DETAIL_IMAGE (PROD_DETAIL_IMAGE_NO, PROD_NO, FILESYSTEM) VALUES (PROD_DETAIL_IMAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{prodNo}, #{filesystem})

SELECT PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PROD_NO, PROD_CATEGORY_NO, PROD_NAME, PRICE, DISCOUNT, PROD_CONTENT, ORIGIN, STOCK, PROD_CREATE_DATE) VALUES (#{prodNo}, #{prodCategoryNo}, #{prodName}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{prodContent}, #{origin}, #{stock}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO PROD_THUMBNAIL (TN_NO, PROD_NO, TN_PATH, TN_ORIGIN, TN_FILESYSTEM, IS_THUMBNAIL) VALUES (PROD_TN_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{prodNo}, #{tnPath}, #{tnOrigin}, #{tnFilesystem}, #{isThumbnail})
